oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Union Bus Terminal
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thompson Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Union Bus Terminal. Hall's and sign for Sears's, Roebuck & Co. at left, Coles Drugs and partial view of Knox Dry Goods Company at right. Car on street. 1931.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bus terminals; Drugstores; Dry goods stores; Automobiles;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
